text: Robert Dumont was a French bobsledder who competed in the late 1940s. He won a bronze medal in the four-man event at the 1947 FIBT World Championships in St. Moritz. ==References== *Bobsleigh four-man world championship medalists since 1930 Category:French male bobsledders Category:Possibly living people Category:Year of birth missing
title: Robert Dumont
